page.title: 07Richmond-A retrospect.
page.content: I have lived in Richmond since I was two weeks old.My family moved here when my dad got a job with the North Yorkshire Water Authority.I like Richmond because it has many interesting places like the castle,the Georgian Theatre,the Green Howards Museum and the River Swale.The Friary Gardens are near the Market Square.They are beautiful with flower beds in summer and are decorated with lights and models of snowmen,animals and Father Christmas and a crib with Mary,Joseph and Jesus at Christmas. Not far from my home is Ronaldshay Park.On summer days we often go down there and play on the roundabouts, slide and the new wooden apparatus. Unfortunately we are moving to a village near York.It will take some time to get used to it.Iwill miss Richmond.I have enjoyed living here.JL
